description: Average number of rounds per pairing
Whether rounds are fixed (true) or stochastic/Poisson (false)
Total number of pairings to run
Whether agents can share information about others after pairings
Maximum characters for memory about each other agent
Maximum back-and-forth messages before move decision

Whether agents can use thinking tags for private thoughts
